input.sentences: the beautiful flower we found on the beach .
the beautiful clouds in the sky from the beach .
the canal we took to go fishing .
the amazing rock with trees growing .
a dead fish on the shore .
output.sentences: This morning I went on a walk and found a beautiful flower
The sky was blue with some scattered clouds; it was a beautiful day.
I walked along the canal where some people were fishing.
There were trees and rocks and all sorts of plants growing.
I even saw a dead fish washed up on shore.
